specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Performance Cool Touch Cool Touch treatment is a finishing process that gives fabric a cool and refreshing feel. It helps absorb and dissipate heat and moisture quickly, keeping the wearer comfortable and dry in hot conditions. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. UV Protection A treatment to reduce fabric exposure to UV rays through application of a UV blocking agent that absorbs or scatters UV rays. Brand Yarn RadilonÂ® Recommended Use Activewear, Leggings, Swimwear
